entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
